content.question: Which of the following would be the best control in this experimental design?

choices.label: Water samples collected from a faucet inside the building
Water samples collected from the roof or parking lot before they passed through the gardens
Soil samples collected from different rain gardens on the property
Soil samples collected from under the parking lots around the city

content.answer: Water samples collected from the roof or parking lot before they passed through the gardens

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify a research method, design, and/or measure used.
